video.title: Pero - The secret of purity
video.text: 'PERO' company was established in early 2022. Despite the fact that our company is new has set very big goals. The most important of these is the high quality that is beneficial to people producing products aimed at fully meeting people's needs. Our company is on this road and our team is committed to your service! Our company is equipped with Turkish technical technologies, which makes our products even more also ensures that it meets world standards of quality, at the same time produced in the leading enterprises of the world and our country We produce using cellulose? We deliver quality products to our people and people, and serve for purity and cleanliness in their place we are proud to do. PERO is for those who love purity.....

production.title: Pero uz
production.text: Our products are made from high quality raw materials. Our product is of high quality and complies with international standards. The main indicators of the quality of our products are strength, softness and hygiene, which corresponds to the analogues of the best world samples.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: Fill out the special form and our experts will contact you soon
contact.info_subtitle: Pero - is a manufacturer of paper products for sanitary purposes. Our company has been operating for many years. Our products are made from high quality raw materials. Our product is of high quality and complies with international standards. Manufactured products can be both budget and premium. The main indicators of the quality of our products are strength, softness and hygiene, which corresponds to the analogues of the best world samples.
